attributes.action: Congratulate himself for taking the tough choices government forces upon people and toppling one of the worst regiems in the world, namely Iraq and supporting the silent marjority in so doing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition is fine. The only reason we cannot accept at present is because of the spelling mistake in "regimes".

If this is corrected then we'll happily add it to the system.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
